title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - May 11th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - May 11th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Drake Bennett details how the company behind Gore-Tex is coming for your eyeballs

-Peter Robison explains how former Boeing engineers say cost-cutting focus sacrificed safety

-Thomas Buckley shows how Barilla pasta is turning from homophobia to national pride

-Chris Rovzar introduces the Beach Blazer to the World.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
